'''''"Ichcahuipilli's Aegis"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Foliar-Swift Wayob Manifestation|text="Ichcahuipilli's Aegis" â€” Will of Scales Resilient}} without being hit by any attacks.

==Gameplay Tips==
Only attacks from Ichcahuipilli's Aegis count for this achievement. Attacks from Nightsoul Warriors and their Dendro damage field do not count.
